notif_channel_description: Indispensable to start the alarm clock!
permission_description: Some parameters can interfere with the proper functioning of "GoWorkDude". Here is the list of permissions to activate to ensure that the alarms ring.
permission_notification_description: Indispensable to start the alarm clock!
permission_notification_policy_descripti: Allows alarms to go off in "Do Not Disturb" mode
permission_battery_optimizations_info:
1. Change Category to "All apps"
2. Search GoWorkDude
3. Choose "Don't Optimize"
